title: Introduction
description: The tools in this SDK make LUCI sensor information and control interfaces available to organizations and leading research institutions, allowing them to use LUCI as a research tool. To use the SDK you need a LUCI Dev Kit (a LUCI enabled wheelchair) updated to LuciCore Sandbox Edition, Version 3.0.5 or greater. If you are interested in becoming a Sandbox Partner, contact info@luci.com.
